content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to read the file "README.md" in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/halflife-regression". The command returned information about Half-Life Regression, including a link to the paper that introduced it, a description of the software used to implement it, and a data set available for download. \n\nSummary:\nI received a command to read "lexeme_reference.txt" and received a list of lexemes and their attributes. I listed the files in the directory and found "lexeme_reference.txt". As a user, I read "lexeme_reference.txt" and listed the files in the directory. I also read "README.md" and received information about Half-Life Regression. Nothing new happened.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best language learning resources"}}}'}]
"""
